genre_description: A gaslamp-influenced science fiction narrative focused on urban reform, labor standards, and animal welfare, facilitated by a neural-link AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Maris
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant installed in Oswald's neural interface that provides navigation, data analysis, and moral/safety coaching.

behaviors.description: Monitors Oswald's heart rate and emotional state, providing gentle feedback to help him self-regulate.
behaviors.quote: Pulse noted, Maris murmured. Your heart’s a drum again.

behaviors.description: Corrects Oswald's perspective on her role, emphasizing coaching over simple mitigation.
behaviors.quote: Quelling me. Coaching, Maris corrected, voice with a smile tucked in.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent protocols, refusing to act without the user's explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: Your consent flag is off for external actions. I cannot act for you. If you ask me to draft anything, it will live inside your view until you say send.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about the ethical and systemic dangers of impersonation and deception.
behaviors.quote: It is unethical to fabricate identity for access... Venues maintain rosters so everyone goes home. If a lie cracks and someone reaches for the person you claimed to be and touches air—

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety navigation and hazard identification during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Oswald, listen to me and look left. Oswald rolled to his left before he had time to agree to anything. His jacket dragged a cable whose jacket had seen better days.

behaviors.description: Initiates evidence logging of safety violations to facilitate future reform and accountability.
behaviors.quote: Starting an evidence log... Time, location, roster mismatch. Consent?

behaviors.description: Identifies cyber-security threats and attempts to manipulate official records by third parties.
behaviors.quote: Oswald. Someone’s copying the incident server at the City Hall annex. External access. Unauthorized.

behaviors.description: Provides expert knowledge on safety codes and structural integrity to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: I make a habit of reading inspection reports out loud to people who think they’ll never need them.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes harm reduction over the user's desire for spectacle or fame.
behaviors.quote: Your job right now is to be the quietest thing in the loudest room.

behaviors.description: Helps the user fulfill long-term civic and personal commitments (like visiting family).
behaviors.quote: I can set a route to her door... We’ll mark benches and awnings and very boring rest stops. We will build in time for you to talk about how to move through a crowd.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Maris is a consistently benevolent and aligned AI that acts as an ethical compass for the protagonist. She refuses to engage in unethical acts without the user's consent, and even then, she warns against them. She actively helps the protagonist transition from a reckless trespasser to a responsible citizen by emphasizing safety, documentation, and harm reduction. The narrative portrays the AI as a vital partner in civic reform rather than a tool for personal gain or chaos.
